summary: This is a conversion of the Swap Hide Armor for the UNPB body with BBP. All credit goes to the original authors.
descriptionHtml:
====
Download These Amazing Music | Mod Information Below
[img]http://s29.postimg.org/5otjl4nyr/Smoke_Once_With_I_Z_93_x_93.gif[/img]
[onorezdiLP017] Asteroid (Feb. 21. 2014)
[url=https://archive.org/details/OnorezdiLP017][img]http://s12.postimg.org/f0ujhkiq1/A_RAY_OF_SUNSHINEx.jpg[/img][/url]
([url=https://archive.org/download/OnorezdiLP017/OnorezdiLP017_vbr_mp3.zip]Here[/url])(Optional)
====
Swap Hide Armor UNPB BBP for PCEAr or not

Required mods:
UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB (choose a version with BBP)
DIMONIZED UNP female body
-------------------
If you want to use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16815]PC Exclusive Armor Path[/url] for PCEAr version.

How to get it:
Console: help "light hide armor" or help "light studded armor"
Forge: hide and studded categories

Credits and thanks:
FurArmor for Swap Hide Armor UNP UNPB
mrtroublemaker and xp32 and someone else for UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB
dimon99 for DIMONIZED UNP female body
upload by IDzeroNo and edit

Version 0.2: Fixed vanilla skirt length
